00037     World(const World& other)
00038     {
00039         std::copy(other.m_givens.begin(), other.m_givens.end(), std::back_inserter(m_givens));
00040         std::copy(other.m_whens.begin(), other.m_whens.end(), std::back_inserter(m_whens));
00041     }

00043     template <typename GivenType>
00044     World& Given()
00045     {
00046         const GivenType* current_given = this->FindGiven<GivenType>();
00047         if (!current_given)
00048         {
00049             boost::shared_ptr<IGiven> given = boost::shared_ptr<IGiven>(new GivenType());
00050             given->setup(*this);
00051             m_givens.push_back(given);
00052 
00053             return *this;
00054         }
00055 
00056         GivenType given_error;
00057         std::stringstream error_message;
00058         error_message << "A given of type " << typeid(given_error).name() << "already exists";
00059 
00060         throw std::logic_error(error_message.str().c_str());
00061     }
00062

00226     template <typename GivenType>
00227     const GivenType* FindGiven() const
00228     {
00229         for (std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<const IGiven> >::const_iterator it = m_givens.begin(); it != m_givens.end(); ++it)
00230         {
00231             GivenType given;
00232             if (typeid(*(it->get())) == typeid(given))
00233             {
00234                 return static_cast<const GivenType*>(it->get());
00235             }
00236         }
00237 
00238         return NULL;
00239     }
00240 
00241     template <typename WhenType>
00242     const WhenType* FindWhen() const
00243     {
00244         for (std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<const IWhen> >::const_iterator it = m_whens.begin(); it != m_whens.end(); ++it)
00245         {
00246             WhenType when;
00247             if (typeid(*(it->get())) == typeid(when))
00248             {
00249                 return static_cast<const WhenType*>(it->get());
00250             }
00251         }
00252 
00253         return NULL;
00254     }
